data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The international students gathered this Wednesday to take an English test. The ____ was ____ to ____ out ____ good ____ skills ____, ____ to ____ them ____ the ____ class. They took the exam in a computer lab, where excellent microphones could record their speech.
data.partBlankContent: The international students gathered this Wednesday to take an English test. The te__ was desi____ to fig___ out h__ good th___ skills we__, a__ to pl___ them i_ the appro______ class. They took the exam in a computer lab, where excellent microphones could record their speech.
data.answer: 国际学生本周三聚集在一起参加英语考试。这项测试的目的是为了弄清他们的技能有多好，并把他们分到适当的班级。他们在计算机实验室里参加考试，那里有好的麦克风可以录下他们的话。
